message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I believe you'll find it to be a game-changer. I'm willing to offer it to you for $950000.
Alice, thanks for the offer. While I'm interested in the product, $950000 is a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $750000 for it.  Let's see if we can work something out.

I understand that $750000 is a bit below my target, but I'm willing to negotiate. I can see the value of the product is high, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer it to you for $875000. Let's see if we can find a mutually beneficial price.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. $875000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm prepared to offer $825000, which is closer to my budget and a good compromise. Let's make this deal happen!

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I can see you're serious about making a deal. I'm willing to meet you at $850000, but I think we can do even better than that. I'll offer it to you for $850000, but I'm not going to budge much further than that. Let's see if we can shake on it.

Alice, I understand you're firm on $850000, but I'm still stuck at my budget. I'm willing to go to $810000, which is a good compromise.  Let's make this happen - it's only $40000 away from your last offer.

I can see you're really trying to make a deal, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $850000 and $810000. I'll offer it to you for $830000. Let's see if we can seal the deal.
Alice, you're getting close to my limit. I'm willing to pay $805000 for the product. This is a fair offer, and I'm confident it's a good deal for both of us. Let's close this deal!

I can see you're really close to your limit, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. I'll make one last concession. I'll offer it to you for $820000. This is as low as I'm willing to go. Let's see if we can finalize the deal.
